entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moose Jaw
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Moose Jaw 10:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -20.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -24.5°C
Wind: NNW 30 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:04 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:04 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 19.
